TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TransactedChangeCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function TransactedChangeCallback(context As Object) As Boolean
type TransactedChangeCallback = delegate of obj -> bool

Docs.param: The method to call when the transaction is invoked.
Docs.summary: A delegate that refers to a method in a custom object that is to be called by the method for implementing property changes in the designer's associated control.
Docs.returns: if the transaction completed successfully; if the transaction should be rolled back.

remarks.format: ## Examples For a code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>.

Docs.related: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode
